pageContext.claim: “Our Economy is very strong, despite the horrendous lack of vision by Jay Powell and the Fed, but the Democrats are trying to 'will' the Economy to be bad for purposes of the 2020 Election....The Fed Rate, over a fairly short period of time, should be reduced by at least 100 basis points, with perhaps some quantitative easing as well.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is trying to blame the Federal Reserve for possible warning signs in the economy, which most experts attribute the uncertainty caused by the president's trade wars. He also falsely accuses the Democrats of cheerleading for an economic downturn.
